fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- Good-aligned faction.
- No factional kill.
- No factional chat.
- Lower power level than <:townFaction:974880541348331541> **Town**, simpler roles.
- Most abilities don't give feedback at all, unless its an investigative one or explicitly said.
- If a dead player would vote by any means, the voter will be shown as an anonymous dead player. Dead votes don't count towards majority.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all evil threats to the Underdogs.
